Class WGraph_Algo

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class WGraph_Algo
extends java.lang.Object
implements weighted_graph_algorithms
This class exist complicated function on graph Deep copy to copy all object to anther memory Check if graph has connection between all nodes found short path between nodes and show the path Save the graph in file and load them
